name: Dad Bod
additionalNotes:
https://www.famous-smoke.com/punch-dad-bod-cigars-dark-natural
With its unique 4 1/2 x 60 Perfecto cigar shape and limited release, the Punch Dad Bod cigar makes a perfect gift for Father's Day. Featuring a band with a tie design and packed in four "reusable stash cans" made to look like beer cans with five cigars in each container, the Punch Dad Bod is a truly special expression of cigar. John Hakim, brand manager for Punch commented, "We created this special expression and packed it in tins that own the soft-in-the-middle physique with pride". Blended with tobaccos from six different countries including a Cameroon wrapper. The diverse tobaccos contained in this special cigar are Connecticut broadleaf binder, and fillers of Brazilian Mata Fina, Dominican Piloto Cubano, and tobaccos from La Entrada in Honduras and Condega, Nicaragua. This is a cigar that any dad would be proud to enjoy. Don't miss out on your chance to make Dad have a truly happy Father's Day!
